column4: Anyone know how could I resize a partition in Gparted from right to left?
how to expand SDA5 to the left?
move it to the left, then increase it's size
Anyone has resized this any time?
and as ActionParsnip said: make sure it is unmounted (so do it from a live CD)
Im running in a live cd
well, so.. If there is any way to... resize from the start...
what is the problem now? can you move it to the left?
I can, but... If i cant move his starting point
ah - I see - you will have to move /dev/sda4 -- I suppose it will take sda5 with it
